ARPB_TX_VOID.name: ARPB_TX_VOID
ARPB_TX_VOID.description: This table contains information on transactions that were either: * Transferred * Voided * Reversed * Retroadjudicated

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: OLD_ETR_ID
columns.description: This item holds a pointer for a transaction that was reposted retroactively to the original transaction.

columns.name: REPOSTED_ETR_ID
columns.description: This item stores a pointer to the old transaction in the case of charge correction or repost.

columns.name: REPOST_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This indicates the type of repost on the source transaction.  This is either set to repost or correction.

columns.name: DEL_REVERSE_DATE
columns.description: This is the date that the transaction was voided or reversed.

columns.name: DEL_CHARGE_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user who voided this transaction.

columns.name: DEL_CHARGE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: DEL_CHARGE_INSTANT
columns.description: This item stores the instant that a transaction was voided.
